name: Lightless Feeding
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is All-Devouring Narwhal, equip this card.
After All-Devouring Narwhal equips this card, immediately use Starfall Shower once.
After your All-Devouring Narwhal, who has this card equipped, uses Starfall Shower to Discard 1 card: Heal this character for that card's Elemental Dice Cost (Once per Round)
(You must have All-Devouring Narwhal in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2204]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A2204] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S22042]</color> once.
After your $[A2204], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S22042]</color> to $[K56] 1 card: Heal this character for that card's Elemental Dice Cost (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A2204] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>All-Devouring Narwhal</color>, equip this card.
After All-Devouring Narwhal equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Starfall Shower</color> once.
After your All-Devouring Narwhal, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Starfall Shower</color> to <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> 1 card: Heal this character for that card's Elemental Dice Cost (Once per Round)
(You must have All-Devouring Narwhal in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: Phosphorescent creatures float all about the dark, moonless seas of dreams â€” perhaps they are as food for some titanic leviathan.
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the All-Devouring Narwhal at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas
